thread.section_title: Express Medical Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Express Medical Supply | www.exmed.net
thread.title: Joy Carter
thread.title_full: Express Medical Supply reviewed by Joy Carter

author: Joy Carter
title: Joy Carter
text: Great experience over past several months. Website helps me find what need, and even useful items I didn't know existed. Customer service is very helpful and has helped me correct things when i made a mistake. I'm delighted to receive products extremely quickly, even when it's a single item.
